author: raghushantha
body:
This PR adds the following enhancements to the MSI installer:

1) Rebrand 'OpenPowerShell' to 'PowerShell'
2) Capture version as a.b.c.d 
3) PowerShell.exe shortcut icon shows high-def PowerShell logo
4) Add/Remove Programs for PowerShell shows PowerShell logo

-Raghu
title: MSI Installer enhancements Part 1
